iv_invalid_range: Initial data is not within the accepted range
iv_negative_particles: The number of particles can't be negative
fv_isobaric_input_error: For the isobaric transformation, you only have to enter the final temperature or the final volume
fv_isovolumetric_input_error: For the isovolumetric transformation , you only have to enter the final temperature or the final pressure
fv_isothermal_input_error: For the isothermal transformation, you only have to enter the final volume or the final pressure
fv_adiabatic_input_error: For the adiabatic , you only have to enter the final pressure or the volume or the temperature

firt_advisor: As you can see later, the control interface is divided into two parts
second_adivisor: In this part you can enter the initial and final data according to their range.
third_advisor: If you click here you can see the history data.
Four_advisor: In this part you can choose the type of transformation of your preference.
fifth_advisor: If you click here you can pause or resume the simulation.
six_advisor: If you click here you can restart or start the simulation.
warn_settings_save_message: Are you sure to save the settings?
pause_error: You can't pause the simulation when it hasn't started
history_error: It can't be saved the data in the history
